description: QboClientService.create throws QBO_SETUP_INCOMPLETE when tenant credentials are missing for realm.
QboClientService.create initializes successfully when tenant credentials and app secrets are present.
Environment/base URL resolution uses sandbox endpoint outside production and production endpoint in production.
query returns parsed Item array when QueryResponse contains Item list.
query returns empty array when QueryResponse is missing or has no entity arrays.
query retries once after 401 by refreshing token and succeeds on second attempt.
query surfaces AppError with mapped code when REST call fails with non-401 fault payload.
query containing CompanyInfo dispatches to CompanyInfo REST endpoint and returns single-element array.
CompanyInfo path returns empty array when API returns no company payload.
create(entityType, data) posts to entity endpoint and returns created entity payload.
create maps REST fault response to AppError with expected code/message shape.
update throws QBO_INVALID_INPUT when Id is missing.
update throws QBO_INVALID_INPUT when SyncToken is missing.
update posts with update operation semantics and returns updated entity payload.
read(entityType, id) returns entity when REST endpoint responds successfully.
read returns null when QBO not-found fault/code is returned.
read maps unexpected REST errors to AppError when failure is not not-found.
401 refresh path updates stored tenant credentials with new access and refresh token values.
401 refresh path throws QBO_AUTH_ERROR when refresh token grant is rejected.
mapQboError maps stale SyncToken code to QBO_STALE_OBJECT.
mapQboError maps object-not-found code to QBO_NOT_FOUND.
mapQboError maps 2xxx validation-style codes to QBO_VALIDATION_ERROR.
findCustomerByDisplayName escapes apostrophes in DisplayName and executes expected query string.
findCustomerByDisplayName returns null when query result is empty.
createOrUpdateCustomer creates customer when no existing record is found.
createOrUpdateCustomer updates customer when existing record has SyncToken.
createOrUpdateCustomer fetches SyncToken via read before update when existing record lacks SyncToken.
createOrUpdateCustomer returns existing record unchanged when SyncToken cannot be resolved.
qboActions getQboItems path still returns normalized item list with unchanged shape.
qboActions connection status validation still resolves CompanyName/ClientName logic correctly.
QuickBooksOnlineCompanyAdapter findExternalCompany still delegates to QboClientService and returns ExternalCompanyRecord/null.
QuickBooksOnlineCompanyAdapter createOrUpdateExternalCompany still delegates and returns ExternalCompanyRecord.
Dependency graph check confirms node-quickbooks is absent after migration dependency updates.
Audit check confirms security warning reduction attributable to removing node-quickbooks request chain.
